pageContent: Objectives: To assess the baseline erectile function (EF) of patients with clinically localized prostate cancer (pCa), who are candidates for a bilateral nerve-sparing radical retropubic prostatectomy (BNSRRP) to (a) objectively rate the preoperative self-reported subjective patient's EF and (b) investigate possible correlations between preoperative EF and demographic data and comorbidities.

metaData.source:
[Correction of erectile dysfunction in patients undergoing radical prostatectomy]
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/24956677/
